text: to you that's fantastic but what about
datastore one of our biggest data stores
its current technology and we decided to
move it to dynamo this was the ride
location tracking system so every GPS
location for all of our rides was stored
in this system we moved it over to
dynamo and it was so simple to scale up
you had two knobs one for right capacity
one for read capacity you didn't have to
carry a pager you didn't have to deal
with chunk migrations it just worked
really really well and we've since moved
many of our other data stores over to
